SEARCH
Package game

Class Enigma

java.lang.Object
game.Enigma
public class Enigma extends Object
Represents a riddle (enigma) that can be presented to a player or bot.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Enigma(String pergunta, String[] opcoes, int indiceCorreto, Dificuldade dificuldade)
    Creates a new Enigma with the given question, options, correct answer index and difficulty.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enigma

      public Enigma(String pergunta, String[] opcoes, int indiceCorreto, Dificuldade dificuldade)
      Creates a new Enigma with the given question, options, correct answer index and difficulty.
      Parameters:
      pergunta - the question text
      opcoes - the list of possible options
      indiceCorreto - the index of the correct option in opcoes
      dificuldade - the difficulty level of this riddle

  • Method Details

    • setEfeitos

      public void setEfeitos(String sucesso, String falha)
      Sets the effect codes for success and failure.
      Parameters:
      sucesso - the effect code to apply when the riddle is answered correctly
      falha - the effect code to apply when the riddle is answered incorrectly

    • getEfeitoSucesso

      public String getEfeitoSucesso()
      Returns the effect code applied when the riddle is answered correctly.
      Returns:
      the success effect code

    • getEfeitoFalha

      public String getEfeitoFalha()
      Returns the effect code applied when the riddle is answered incorrectly.
      Returns:
      the failure effect code

    • getPergunta

      public String getPergunta()
      Returns the question text.
      Returns:
      the question

    • getOpcoes

      public String[] getOpcoes()
      Returns the array of possible options.

      Returns the difficulty level of this riddle

    • verificarResposta

      public boolean verificarResposta(int opcaoEscolhida)
      Verifies whether the chosen option corresponds to the correct answer.
      Parameters:
      opcaoEscolhida - the chosen option number (1-based)
      Returns:
      true if the chosen option is the correct one, false otherwise
